Pool was small but very clean and not busy at all so great place to relax after a day of shopping.  Lots of restaurants close by and a Target two blocks away. Summary Heading: What you would expect for the price

We stayed here after spending a couple nights downtown LA to balance out our hotel budget. I wouldn't come back but it was adequate for what we needed it for. If you need a cheap place to stay and really aren't picky this works. What sums up this hotel was the grab bar in the bathroom, it was at some point replaced with a PVC pipe.

Summary: We want to thank Nira & Dharmesh for our great stay at their hotel.  Whenever we visit the Buena Park/Anaheim area, we enjoy staying in the suites at the Portola Inn.  The rooms are clean, well equipped and the price is very reasonable.  Looking forward to our next trip to that area.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you are a returning guest and we thank you for your feedback. It is so great to hear of the great compliments you have on our team members. As your review states, we have pretty spacious rooms, and all of our rooms are filled with such amenities as microwave, mini-fridge, personal coffee maker, Iron, Iron board, and hair dryer. You must also know that we also offer free Wi-Fi, parking and continental breakfast. Once again, it brings us such joy to hear the comments of a returning guest.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Good value - had an issue with our first room, was promptly remedied with a room change. Elevator was sketch, continental breakfast a joke - but, Target is right down the road, we picked up some groceries and between the microwave and fridge we were all set. Everything seemed clean, fairly up to date - would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are happy to hear you liked the new layout of our rooms, especially how clean we try to maintain all of our rooms. We hope you took advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you next time you are in the Buena Park/Orange County area.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Large, clean room at a good price.  Microwave and fridge were handy.  My wife really liked the beds.  Very close to Knott's, Medieval Times, Pirates, freeway.  Not too far from Disney.  Breakfast was minimal but we had read about that.  Pool was cold and not very clean, only went in hot tub.
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. It is great to hear how much our guests enjoy our newly remodeled rooms. As you were already aware, we are only a few minutes away from Knott's Berry Farm, Medieval Times and a short driving distance from Disney. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi, complimentary breakfast and parking. We appreciate and value your feedback greatly. Once again, thank you for your time. We hope to see you next time you are in the Buena Park area.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Customer service Good Rooms not so much
Summary: We reserved 2 rooms for 5 nights we stayed 1... The rooms are disgusting for being "newly remodeled" the carpet was gross feeling I didnt let my little run around. The lights in the bathroom were out and the water pressure was terrible. The draining in the tub was slow and took hours to drain. Pictures are very deceiving, and other comments were too! The beds are terribly hard and have no sort of comfort for a good nights rest very disappointed and not a good way to start a vacation.
Manager Response: Let me take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience that arose during your stay. Please know that we have a 24-hour front desk that could have easily fix most of the issues that were encountered inside the room. Also, this is not the typical scenario one will find at our hotel as all of our rooms are inspected on a daily basis. We also thank you for bringing this to our attention as those issues will be immediately fixed.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Clean, nicely decorated room.  Responsive staff.  I would be happy to stay again.  The breakfast is very minimal, but does include oranges and apples.  The refrigerator makes it easy to have milk and cereal in the room.  My only complaint is that the standard practice seems to be to leave only one wash cloth in a room for two.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear of the great experience you had while at Portola Inn and Suites. And we are also happy to know you liked the brand new layout of our rooms, which include 37-inch flat screen television, microwave, mini fridge, Iron, Iron board, study table and hair dryer. You'll be happy to know that we also offer free Wi-Fi, and as you have stated, free continental breakfast. I will look into the issue with the wash cloths so this does not happen again. Once again, we are very thankful for your feedback and we hope that next time you come stay with us, your visit will be a perfect one.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Like what most of the other reviews have said, Portola is really your basic inn. The bathroom, the vanity and the overall room was decently clean except for my only pet peeve, the carpet. The carpet is really dingy and dark, I stepped on it with my feet and it felt dirty and left black marks. I read in one of the management's comment that they steam clean it twice a month. I would really hope that they start steam cleaning more often or invest in new carpet because it was really dirty. Other than that, location was good, the mattress was comfortable, the flat screen TV a plus (lacking in channels) and the internet worked fine. I didn't buy breakfast because I read it wasn't worth it (eat at Fresh Bagels and Cafe instead).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback regarding your recent stay at Portola Inn and Suites. We are glad you enjoyed our new televisions and you'll be happy to know that we are in the process of getting a better, high definition channel line-up. If you were not aware, we do provide free continental breakfast. We are happy that the new wirelss access points that were installed a few weeks ago gave you no problems when connecting to our wi-fi. Once again, thank you for the feedback and we hope to see you next time you are in the Buena Park area.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed here while dropping daughter off to college. Didn't use pool. Stayed in January. Very basic motel. Large room, clean. Very appropriate for the price. If you want simple and clean and inexpensive this is your place. Will stay again.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you had a pleasurable experience while staying at Portola Inn and Suites. Thank you for your feedback and as you were aware, the prices of our rooms are affordable and cheap. We hope you got to enjoy our free amenities, such as free Wi-Fi, continental breakfast and parking. As you may have been aware, all our rooms have been completely updated with flat screen 37-inch televisions and new bed layout. Again, we are glad you had an enjoyable experience while at Portola. We hope you will be able to stay with us again next time you are in the Buena Park area.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice hotel, reasonably priced with outstanding value. The room was clean, and well organized. Staff was very friendly and efficient. Hotel was easy to enter and exit with resterants and businesses located nearby. Would stay here again shold the need arise.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you had an enjoyable time during your stay at Portola Inn and Suites. As you were aware, we have remodeled our rooms with 37-inch flat screen television in every room. We hope you were able to enjoy all the free amenities we offer, such as Wi-Fi, Parking and continental breakfast. And once again, thank you very much for the great review you have on our hotel.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay after theme parks (with hire car)
Summary: Check in was easy as was finding the hotel. The rooms we had 320a and 320b were clean and always serviced to a high standard. The beds were warm and extra blankets and pillows were provided as necessary. The room also has heating and cooling which worked well.   Cons- The free wifi was terrible!!!! Barely worked and when it did it was super slow. When we asked for help we were told it was working fine. The towels were like sandpaper and very small.  One night the room keys wouldn't work (for no apparent reason) so we had to return to reception twice.   We didn't eat at the hotel...though breakfast was included. We paid less than $1000 AUD for 5 people in two room for a week. If you are in Anaheim for the theme parks and don't mind a short drive (less than 15mins) I would
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Portola Inn and Suites. We are very happy to hear you had an amazing week while staying at our Buena Park property. As you found out, the rates of our rooms are economical, where any family can save money while enjoying their time at any of the nearby theme parks, such as Knott's Berry Farm, Disneyland or Universal Studios. Thank you once again for your review.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: After reading several good reviews my husband and I made a reservation at the Portola for 11/30-12/2/12. I was not expecing luxury but I felt like we had gotten a good deal. I was sorely wrong.  We arrived late at night and checked in around midnight using the night window. As I was checking in I could hear people from rooms nearby screaming at each other. Check-in was fast as I had already paid and we went to our room- a corner room on the second floor. As soon as we walked in we were very dissapointed. The room had a strong musty smelled- we booked a non-smoking room but it stilled had a strong smoke smell. The carpet was disturbingly filthy. It was almost black! The sheets were stained and had several black marks, lke they had been run over. We dids not even shut the door
Manager Response: Let me start by apologizing for the experience you had while checking in at Portola. Please be aware that what you experienced is not the typical ambiance one would expect to see at our property. At Portola Inn and Suites, we try to give our guest a pleasurable and relaxing experience. That is why we have a 24-hour front desk shall any issue arise any time of the night. Again, please accept our most sincere apologies and we hope you'll give us another chance so that you can see all the improvements we had made since your last visit.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Portola and Knotts Berry Farm visit
Summary: Excellent value. We took a family suite and this was perfect for us; two adults and two teenage kids. No issues with cleanliness, as other review indicated.  No traffic noise either. Glad of the elevator with heavy luggage! A fridge and microwave were appreciated, though no laundry facilities.  Proximity to Knotts Berry Farm made it perfectly located for my family and I was not prepared to pay  50-75% more to stay at the Knotts Berry Resort Hotel. Forget the free breakfast, go to IHOP just  down the road!
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and are very happy to have been part of your vacation plans.  As you were aware, all of our rooms have many amenities such as microwave, mini-fridge, Iron, Iron board, coffee maker-all free of charge!. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi also. We thank you once again for the great review you have on Portola Inn and Suites, and we hope you will consider us on your next vacation plans.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed for 8 nights at Portola. The room was spacious, clean and there was fridge and microwave. The location is great. Near malls, restaurants and parking is easy to find at any time. The best of all is Mr Pattel. He was always willing to go the extra mile to please the guests. He helped me with directions, held a book I ordered for 2 weeks prior to my arrival, lent me a scale (to check my suitcases weight) and our morning chats over breakfast were a good and pleasantable  way to start the day. Thanks so much for the lovely stay. Luis
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear about the great experience you encounter while at Portola Inn and Suites. Thank you for the wonderful compliments you have about our rooms. As you were able to see, all of our rooms do come with a fridge, microwave, Iron, Iron board and coffee maker. You'll be happy to hear that we also have a 24-hour front desk and yes, there is ample parking space at our facility. I will personally let Mr. Patel know about the great compliments you have about his service. Thank you again for the amazing review!  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Me and my husband was stay there last week it was excellent stay the room is big clean, with everything you need, front desk staff  excellent. Manager is always redy for all our question.and really close to Disney , knott and highway what we need more.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review you have on our Buena Park property. It is always a pleasure to hear good comments about our property from such wonderful guests as yourself. Yes, our number one priority is to always have clean rooms and to always exceed the expectations of our guests. Also, our rooms do come with free Wi-Fi, complimentary breakfast and parking. And our rooms are fully accommodated with microwave, mini fridge, hair dryer, and coffee maker. Once again, we hope you had a pleasurable experience at Portola Inn and Suites, and we hope you can stay with us next time you are in the Buena Park/Orange county area.  Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It may have been a good value but it was so dirty. I noticed the bottom of my kid's feet after being in the room for only 20 minutes. They were black. The sidewalk outside was cleaner than the carpets. I saw housekeeping vacuuming, BUT, they need to invest in a carpet cleaner. I rubbed a towel on to several places on the floor and i just couldn't believe how dirty it was.  We booked using Bookit.com and the write up said it was located 4 blocks from Knott's Berry Farm, and you could walk there. Wrong. It was at least 1 mile away. You either pay $15 parking fee at the park or walk a mile. I can't find it listed on Bookit.com anymore. We will stay somewhere else next time.
Manager Response: It is unfortunate to hear about the carpet issue you had during your stay at Portola Inn and Suites. Please be aware that we do clean our carpets twice a month, but were not able to clean that particular room because we had been really busy the week prior to your arrival. We hope you got the chance to enjoy our free complimentary breakfast and all the amenities our rooms offer.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good budget hotel for visiting theme parks
Summary: We just got back from a 3 night stay while visiting the Disney theme parks.  This hotel was perfect for our budget-minded family.  The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable.  As other reviewers have mentioned, the breakfast is not great, the tv has a very limited selection of channels and the wi-fi is really bad.  None of those issues were deal-breakers for us.  The Disney parks were a short 8 minute drive away and this hotel is very close to Knotts Berry Farm.  This hotel would be perfect for the night if you are doing the Knott's Halloween Haunt and did not want to drive home at 2 am.  The area seemed very safe and I never had any concerns about the neighborhood.  We did notice the "odor" when we first checked in, but it was a clean odor of some air freshener.  It was
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for taking the time to provide us with a review regarding your stay at our Buena Park property. You have completely and nicely described all the amenities that are offered at Portola Inn and Suites. We apologize for any inconvenience our free Wi-Fi might have cause you during your stay. Please be aware that we are continually working with our telephone company in order to provide our guest with the fastest Wi-Fi. Yes, you are absolutely right when you say we are a couple of minutes from Knotts and only an eight minute drive to Disneyland. Once again, we are very thankful for the great review.  Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I can recommend this hotel to anyone who's looking to find a reasonable, clean and friendly place in Orange County / L.A. area. I stayed for 1 week and it was easy for me to like it: Easily accessible by car: 5 and 91 fwys are closer than 1 mile Located in the center of Orange County. 10min drive to Disneyland, 25min to Beach, Knotts Berry Farm and some other attractions right next door. Hollywood 30min, Downtown LA 25min. Huge Parking Lot, always spaces available, even on the weekend (I stayed 1 week) Rooms clean, light colors, fridge, free wireless internet, air condition. Spacious. Basic TV stations (don't know if it was cable or sat). I think no HBO. Clean bathroom Pool and Spa Very friendly staff My summary is that this is a hidden jewel in the low price range in Southern
Manager Response: We are elated to hear you enjoyed your week at our hotel and we are also very happy to read how beautifully you have broken down all the nearby attractions and freeways that are close to Portola Inn and Suites. We hope you were able to appreciate our free complimentary breakfast, and we are glad that our team members were able to assist you with your needs. We hope you can give us another visit next time you are in the Buena Park! And again, thank you for your wonderful review.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: The reviews about the smell are not exaggerating
Summary: The hotel itself is not terrible.  The rooms are not terrible.    What was really unacceptable was the smell in the rooms.  Don't know if this was due to recent remodeling or cleaning, but it is truly overwhelming.  I asked to try a couple of other rooms - same thing.    I've read "overpowering odor" reviews before at hotels that I've stayed at and wondered what these people were talking about.  Trust me on this one.  The smell is prevalent.  Had it not been for this, I'd say that for $75, it's a 2 1/2 star room.
Manager Response: It is unfortunate to hear you did not enjoyed your stay to its fullest during your recent visit to Portola Inn and Suites. Please be aware that we do take the appropriate measures to ensure our rooms are odor-free, and as clean as possible. I will talk to management to see if we can come up with a way to prevent a room from having an "overwhelming smell" to it. We greatly appreciate your feedback. It is with feedback such as yours that we are able to better improve our quality and standard. Thank you again for the review and we hope you can give us another opportunity at showing you the improvements we have made to our Buena Park property.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed here for only one night.  The room was clean, updated and safe.  There was also free internet access.  The room had a microwave, coffee pot and refrigerator.  The room was spacious and bright.  I would recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review you have on our Buena Park property. You have basically summed up all the amenities we offer with six sentences. We are glad to hear the rooms were to your liking. We hope you got the chance to enjoy our free complimentary continental breakfast and parking. And we hope you can book with us next time you are in the Buena Park area.  Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We picked this hotel because it had the lowest prices and we were on a budget. We stayed two nights while we were visiting Disneyland. The staff was friendly and checking in and out went smoothly. The room we got (non-smoking) was clean, we got fresh towels each day and there was plenty of parking. The area is very quiet. The free breakfast is minimal.They have coffee, fruit,muffins, toast, and juice but there are plenty of restaurants nearby if you're really hungry. I didn't use the wi-fi ,but it is available if you want and there is cable (not many channels but we didn't watch much tv). Since we were only there to sleep, it was a good, economical choice for us. It was a little farther from Disneyland than I would have liked, but the drive was quick. If you're looking for a
Manager Response: We are glad to hear to enjoyed your stay at our Buena Park hotel. And it is also great to hear that all of our team members took care of your needs beginning with the check-in process and continuing with the supply of clean towels. We are happy to hear about the cleanliness of the rooms as we always try to keep our rooms as neat and clean as possible. Thank you for your review and we hope you can give our free Wi-Fi a chance next time you come to stay at Portola Inn and Suites.  kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: There is a lot of good things to say about this place, such as a good sized room and very clean, but it misses the mark on a number of things. I haven't used an internet connection this slow for almost 15 years or so. In addition to being slow, the connection would be lost every 10 minutes or so.  If you spend a lot of time on the net, this is not the place for you. Although I liked my room otherwise, I will not be coming back.  The pool is small, and OK for kids but not for adults. One of the reasons I chose this place was because I wanted to swim in the evening, but that didn't work out. I guess the truth of the matter is if you want a decent sized pool, you have to pay more.  Forget the continental breakfast unless you like cheap muffins, coffee, apples or oranges. Not much
Manager Response: We are glad you liked the cleanliness of our rooms and how spacious they are. But at the same time, we apologize if you had trouble using our free Wi-Fi. Please be aware that we have a 24-hour front desk that can help with any issue that may arise during the course of the day or night. Also, thank you for all your feedback as it is going to be of great help in the continued improvements of our Buena Park property.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: When we checked in the office girl was rude and the office smelled.  We asked for a ground floor room we got the 3rd floor we asked for smoking we got non, none of our request were met and we booked a month and a half ahead of time.  We asked for extra pillows and towels the rude girl at the front desk said she could only let us have two more of each (really, we are 4 women we use two towels each time we shower).  Coffee in room was terrible, lobby juice was okay.  The room was average, toilet paper was hard, would not recommend anyone to stay here.
Manager Response: It is unfortunate to hear your expectations were not met when you arrived to our hotel. At Portola Inn and Suites, we always try to take the appropriate measures to have the best costumer service. I will personally talk with all of our team members so that this does not happen to you or to any future guest. I will especially talk to them about following guest requests as best as possible. Thank you for the feedback you have given us. And we hope you can give us another chance at showing you all the improvements we have made to our hotel.  Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great place up until my departure!
Summary: Well, we thought great place for the price! We were not going to be in the room much anyways.  We went to Pirates Dinner Adventure and Knott's the next day. Any other time we had was in the pool and hot tub.  Management was very helpful with all our needs.  The day of check out was the problem. A cleaning staff kept coming to our room and wanting to come in to clean while we were getting ready. Now check out is at 11am and our kids were in the pool at 9 am and she was trying to come in, not once but three times we had to say that we would check out at 11am and she could come then.  At 10:50am I checked out of our room. My husband was still loading the car and getting our bags out and the cleaning lady was already making the beds! The worst part, she didn't change the sheets!
Manager Response: It is unfortunate to hear you did not enjoyed your stay with us to its fullest. Please be aware that our maids are given a cleaning procedure that states they must always used new linens in every room they clean. Also, please take our most sincere apologizes for what you had to go through during check-out. This should not happen to any of our guests regarding if they are checking-out or not. I have already had a meeting with all the maids, and they are fully aware that they are not to knock on the guest who are checking-out until eleven in the morning. We hope you will give us another chance at staying with us so you can see all the improvements we have made to our hotel.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I have our Disneyland Annual Passes and because we get free parking, we can stay at any hotels we want outside of Anaheim. As we were looking online for a place to stay, we found Portola Inn in Buena Park with satisfying reviews.  We decided to try it once and since then we have been staying there each time.  They have the friendliest staff members, the room is very comfortable and have all the necessary appliances (e.g., microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker) we need.  Its location is so convenient that it's close to stores, church, gas stations, restaurants, etc.  Most of all, their rates are very reasonable.  One I'd truly recommend!!! - RStreit
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay at our Buena Park hotel, and thank you for the review you have on our hotel. We are glad you found all the accommodations we offer in every single room to your liking. I am sure you also enjoyed the other amenities we offer at Portola, like free Wi-Fi, free parking and free continental breakfast. Yes, we are located only minutes away from most restaurants and stores. Again, thank your for your great review and hope to see you next time you visit Disneyland.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I don't know what people expect for the price they pay. I arrived to Portola Inn afraid of what I would see since I have read the reviews and they were not so good. I was so surprised when I arrived: the room is big, clean, with everything you need, VERY NICE STAFF, really close to Disneyland and close to the highway which is great if you are not only visiting Disneyland. NO COMPLAINTS. It is not a 5 stars hotel and you don't pay a 5 stars hotel price so do not expect for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our Buena Park location. And thank you for the great review to have on our hotel. Yes, at Portola Inn and Suites, our rooms are fully accommodated with microwave, hair dryer, coffee maker, free parking, free continental breakfast and free Wi-Fi. It is always good to hear that our guest enjoyed their stay and our hotel! We look forward to seen you again next time you are in the Buena Park area.  Kind Regards,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for...
Summary: We stayed here with our family of five for a trip to Disneyland. The staff was friendly, which is always nice. The location seemed to be in a safe area. It is close to Disneyland and other area attractions. The pool is rather small and the professional picture of it is somewhat deceiving (however this is not a huge concern). My biggest complaint was the cleanliness. The floor was very dirty and our socks turned black from walking around on it. The rooms are in need of some updating, adding a little more brightness to a rather drab room. All in all, you simply get what you pay for. We plan on coming back to California soon and will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Portola Inn and Suites. All your feedback in of great importance to us. We are also sad to hear our rooms were not to your liking. Please be advised that we steam clean our carpets twice a month so that we can provide our guest with the cleanest room carpets possible. Also, we are working on upgrading a few amenities to our already fully accomodated rooms. We hope you can give us another opportunity at serving you so you can see all the improvements we have made to our Buena Park location. Thank you once again for your time.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is the first time a tripadvisor review has disappointed me. This hotel was rated #3 in Buena Park the day I reserved it. It didn't deserve anything close to that. The cement walkways in front of the rooms looked like they hadn't been washed for weeks. What appeared to be dried, spilled drinks and oily grease residue spotted (big spots) the walkways.  The cleanliness of the room was only minimally acceptable and smelled of strong, cheap deodorizer.  The in-room coffee maker emitted a terrible odor when turned on. I am convinced it simply had not been cleaned in some time.  I sincerely hate to complain about this property. The front desk clerks were very courteous and helpful. The property looks very nice from the road and could easily take a legitimate #2 or #3 spot in the
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that our Buena Park hotel was not  up to your standards, and thank you so much for all the advice you have provided for us. You will be happy to hear that we are working delingently on all the issues that were brought up by your review. I have personally talked to our team members about making sure all room amenities are clean and in working condition. Thank you very much for your feedback. It is of extreme importance. We hope you can stay with us on your next trip to the Buena Park area so you can see all the changes we have implemented to Portola Inn and Suites. Thanks again,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was looking for a cheap place to stay, I'm glad I found Portola inn, stayed for 2 nights,we got to check in 2 hours early which is great,  nice location, the room is clean, with Microwave and Fridge, affordable, quite, we're going back to California  and we will stay at Portola Inn again, definitely I will recomend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to review your stay at Portola Inn and suites. It is always great to hear that our guest had a pleasurable experience while staying with us. You are certainly right when you say that Portola offers the best available rates to all its guest, and yeah our rooms are fully furnished with a microwave, fridge, t.v, hair dryer, free continental breakfast, parking and Wi-Fi. We hope to see you again when you return to visit beautiful Southern California. Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: My Sabbatical at Portola Inn and Suites
Summary: Everything was fabulous except the TV....the supposed HBO was actually CNN, so I was not able to see movies I generally don't get to see at home, since we don't have cable or satellite. And your wireless was constantly going on and off, making watching Netflix, which I needed to watch since I didn't have a movie channel on the TV or many other channels that I don't already have w/o cable. You might want to look into a different carrier as you may not be getting what you are paying for.  But other than that, I  LOVED my stay and will stay again sometime! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your fabulous review on our Buena Park property. And we are sorry to hear of the small inconveniences you had while at Portola Inn and Suites. Let me assure you that we are diligently working with the cable company that provides us with their service so that we can provide our guest with the best line-up of cable channels. We are also working on fixing the issue you had with our free Wi-Fi service. Thank you again for your wonderful review and we hope to see you next time you are in the Buena Park area.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: The BEST place to stay in the city
Summary: We were so pleased with our stay...it was only one night we wished it would have been longer. The rooms where very nice and most of all CLEAN and the staff was very FRIENDLY!!! if your looking for a place to stay I recommend this place. Excellent, excellent!!!
Manager Response: First and foremost, let me take this opportunity to thank you deciding to book with us during your visit to the Buena Park area. We are glad you liked all the amenities all of our rooms have to offer, and our team members will be glad to know that their hard work is noticed by such wonderful guest as yourself! Once again, thank you for the great review, and we hope to see you again next time you are back in the Buena Park area. Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Spacious, great location, clean, well-appointed, safe, quiet, reasonably priced, exceptional staff...what more can I say.  I will stay at Portola Inn and Suites whenever I am in Orange County and I would recommend this motel to everyone - singles, couples and families.  Thank you for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review you have on our Buena Park property! We are glad we exceeded your expectations, and that you enjoyed the entire days you stayed with us. At Portola Inn and Suites, we take pride in having safe and well-appointed clean and spacious rooms. Our teams members are always glad to be of assistance any time of the day or night, since we have a 24-hour front desk. Once again, thank you for the wonderful review and we hope to see you again next time you are in the Buena Park area. Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights for our Disneyland trip and absolutely loved it. Parking was never a problem and had a great central location to beaches. The lady at the front desk was super nice. The room/bathroom were clean and the appliances worked. The shower was nice and clean. The beds/pillows were really comfortable, the air conditioning felt great and the TV had Cartoon Network. The pool was a little cold, but the jacuzzi was relaxing. Price was good so we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments you have regarding our Buena Park property. At Portola Inn and Suites, we always try to exceeds our guests expectations, and our team members will be glad to know we exceeded your expections. We hope you can stay with us next time you and your family visit the Buena Park area.   Kind regards, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: OMG! Go to the Hampton Inn across the way! Stay anywhere but here!  The pics are extremely misleading. The beds were decent, clean sheets and and no noticeable stains...so that's the ONLY plus. Granted, you get what you pay for but what I am about to share is beyond belief.  After a long evening at Disneyland we relaxed on the beds, checked our e-mail (free wi-fi, so that was a plus), and watched some t.v. . .beds were decent. . .so far so good. Then, it was off to take a shower. . .wait for it! Duh-duh-duh. . .rust-stained bathtub, a white-crusty shower-head in need of a serious CLR soak, and dingy looking "white" towels. Summary: Stayed overnight on December 18 after a visit to Knotts Berry Farm.  This was our second stay.  We paid $69 for a Saturday night in a room with 2 queen beds.  It was a very good value for the price.  The inn is located a mile down the street from Knotts and is close to a Sizzlers and Denny's.  Room was updated and clean. The bathrooms are sparse and have not been updated yet but room included refrigerator and microwave.  There is also a small table with two chairs.  Continental breakfast was nice with coffee, packaged danishes, apples/oranges and bread for toasting.  Also includes free wi-fi though a bit slow.  Front desk clerk was very nice.  All things considered this was a good value for the price.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights on a recent family trip to Disneyland because the price was reasonable and the reviews were good compared to other hotels/motels in this price range.  Since we weren't planning to be in the room much and had a car, we weren't too worried about it being away from anything.  There was a liquor store and a restaurant within walking distance, but that was about all we saw in the area.    The rooms were clean and they were a decent size, but the beds were uncomfortable and the HVAC unit didn't work well, so the room got too stuffy and uncomfortable.  On our first night, we heard the owner's guests leaving and there was loud conversation outside the exit to their unit (attached to the lobby) in the parking lot area for about 30 minutes around 11pm. Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel, Amazing Price, Amazing Service
Summary: This place was ABSOLUTELY amazing! Checking in was so easy and the fellow behind the counter was incredibly nice and helpful! I cannot say enough about the service of this hotel. We had an amazing view that became more amazing as night fell. Also, we needed a cord to hook our computer to the tv screen - the staff went out and purchased one for us! I recommend this place to anyone looking for a hotel in CA.  Definetely among the best hotels I have stayed in. Among the pros : beautiful decor, perfectly clean, great food, great location, wonderful staff, friendly concierge, etc... . I can not think of anything negative to say abouth the Portola Inn and Suites. Congratulations to the manager and to all the management and staff.

Summary Heading: Great Value and location. Super friendly and helpful staff
Summary: This is a very nice little motel, clean and was convenient for us, and is great value. We walked to Knott's Berry Farm, and the pirates and Medieval Times dinner shows, all only about 15-20 minutes walk, and Disneyland is about a $30 cab ride away. I would suggest hiring a car if coming from LA airport though, as we payed about $35 each, I think, for a shuttle to disneyland, and then another $30 cab ride from there.    The free wi-fi is also a great bonus. It did have some dropping out problems, but it is more than a lot of places offer, especially at this price. Summary Heading: Do not book here if you have to  cancel
Summary: We had to  change our travel plans to this motel.  I called FIVE days in advance and they will not cancel our reservation and take off the pending charge on our credit card..  They would not provide me with a corporate office name or telephone number.  The Manager told me he would personally call me back and had a front desk person call me instead to offer me two nights at another time or 50% off a two night stay at another time.  I checked back at their website and could re-book 2 nights and only give a 24 hr. notice of cancellation.  This is an unacceptable way to do business in our minds. Summary: Being the most affordable hotel in the area, I wasn't expecting much, but boy was I wrong. I called the hotel to let them know that we'd be checking in later after our trip to Knott's Berry Farm and I was advised that was not a problem and that we'd be taken care of no matter what time of night. Check in was quick and smooth, the receptionist was polite! The rooms looked like they had just been remodeled, all the furniture was new and luxurious! The bed was comfy and the water pressure in the shower was great! The room even had it's own mini fridge and microwave!!! Great location, close to everything, food, freeway, fun! Best bang for my buck in the area! Thanks!

Summary Heading: I was disappointed when I first drove up to the parking lot and saw the motel style rooms with separate entrances
Summary: It then hit me that this was a true motel, and not a hotel from what I had expected.  I guess I expected more because there were many good reviews I had read.  There was also a great picture of the room on the website and the picture of the continental breakfast looked very appealing, which is why I decided to book with them,despite the fact that is is rated 2 stars.  The motel was not clean, beds not comfy and the continental breakfast consisted of only one type of fruit a day, a small wrapped danish and a weak coffee.   We stayed for 3 nights.  Though I didn't check, I kept thinking of the possibility of bed bugs.  On the last day, my 2 year old son cut his toe at the corner of the front door because there was a piece of metal sticking out from the bottom corner!

Summary: Spare but spotless budget inn; updated.  Warm and friendly manager and maids. Very good vibe.  Pool small but clean; could use some potted plants as it sits right on the street.  Fresh fruit and strong coffee.  Very good bargain and beats the place on the corner of Knott/Orangethorpe that is also cheap. Looking forward to next stay.

Summary: We paid approximately $45-50 per night because we stayed for quite a few nights which was a pretty good deal for the area. The hotel room was well appointed, it had a mini fridge, mircowave and coffee maker (with coffee to make). The carpet was dark blue but I could tell it was dirty because our feet got dirty but otherwise it was very clean. Breakfast was basic--a packaged sweet roll, white bread toast with jam, packaged granola bars and orange juice--better than nothing that's for sure. We also got a pretty good free wi-fi signal. The management was very nice. We didn't go in the pool. The jacuzzi was just luke warm so that was disappointing. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area! We appreciate your time in completing the review on our hotel. As you may have guessed, we are so happy to hear that your experience with us was nearly perfect! That is quite a compliment! It is always so rewarding for us to hear how much our guests enjoy their visit with us. Come see us again soon!

Summary: Rooms were clean but this is a very minimal hotel (you get shampoo packets instead of bottles).  Experienced lots of traffic noise in the morning.  In terms of walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm, it's probably 15-20 minutes away?? (We did not walk but gauging from the driving time it's not that close).  "Continental breakfast" consisted ONLY of individually packaged danish & 1/2 pot of brewed coffee.  It wasn't too expensive so I guess you get what you pay for.

Summary: Very close to Knotts and Disneyland. Very Nice and clean place
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice compliments on convenient accommodations. We truly appreciate your time in giving us your feedback. We are very proud of all that we have to offer, which includes great quality at affordable rates! Thanks again!

Summary: We paid $99+tax per night for a two room "suite" with 2 queens and 1 king.  No coffee maker or iron.  Room was clean, except for bathroom - looked like it hadn't been used in awhile.  If you can deal with smaller beds, I'd definitely stay elsewhere!  Our friends stayed at Radisson less than 1 mile away - much nicer hotel with many amenities for same price - however, they had 2 doubles and 1 sofa bed. This hotel shouldn't be able to advertise "free breakfast", as it doesn't even pass as a "continental breakfast."  If you consider individually wrapped danish bought in bulk at grocery store, coffee, juice, bananas and apples as "breakfast", then this may be the spot for you!  Very disappointing, as similarly priced hotels had full hot breakfast included. I would not recommend this
